author: hwright
msg: Add a test to attempt to upgrade a working copy with stale logs.  Mark this
test XFail, since we currently run logs before upgrading, so we can't

author: gstein
msg: Dump out some basic skeleton structure for a new editor interface.

author: hwright
msg: Rough cut at directory-by-directory upgrades to wc-ng.  This still relies on
the old loggy upgrade process, but it works.
(check_format): If desired, check the format of a wc-ng working copy.
(basic_upgrade, upgrade_1_5):  Expect a wc-ng formatted working copy, if
(should_create_next_get): New, copied right out of entries.c.
(upgrade_format_old): New name for the old svn_wc__upgrade_format().
(svn_wc__upgrade_format): New function, which does the wc-ng upgrade (or
alternatively dispatches to the old upgrader).

author: pburba
msg: On the 1.5.x-r37156 branch: Merge r37156 from trunk.
(merge_to_sparse_directories): Don't expect tree conflicts in shallow
children, those are a 1.6.x feature, instead expect skips.  Don't do a
dry-run merge either as that only reports to top of the skipped tree,
but the real merge reports the skipped paths within the tree.
